title: Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Bluetooth Headphones are engineered with world-class noise cancellation, making them ideal for music, travel, and relaxation. These headphones feature a high-quality audio performance with volume-optimized EQ for balanced audio performance at any volume. The noise-rejecting dual-microphone system ensures clear calls even in noisy environments. The QC35 II headphones are Alexa-enabled for voice access to music, information, and more. With a battery life of up to 20 hours, they offer long-lasting listening sessions. The multi-function button gives you access to your phone's default virtual assistant, like Siri. The Bose Connect app helps you manage your paired devices and provides access to future updates. The lightweight materials and cushioned earcups provide maximum comfort, making these headphones perfect for all-day use. Additionally, these headphones feature a robust build quality designed to withstand daily wear and tear. The intuitive controls on the earcup allow you to manage your music and calls with ease. Experience rich, immersive sound with deep bass and crisp highs. Ideal for professionals, travelers, and music lovers, the Bose QC35 II headphones ensure you stay connected and entertained wherever you go.
key_features: Up to 20 hours of battery life
meta_title: Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Exceptional Noise Cancellation
meta_description: Buy Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Bluetooth Headphones. Features world-class noise cancellation, 20-hour battery life, and Alexa-enabled. Ideal for all-day use.
